headline: Kemp holds wide lead in Georgia governor race: poll
author: Lexi Lonas
sentences: Brian Kemp holds a more than 20-point lead in the Republican gubernatorial primary race against former Sen. David Perdue (Ga.), according to a new poll by the University of Georgia's School of Public and International Affairs on behalf of The Atlanta Journal-Constitution.
